edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.requirementmanager.models

Class Requirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.AbstractModel
      • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.requirementmanager.models.Requirement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model

    public class Requirement
extends AbstractModel
    Basic Requirement class that contains the data to be stored for a Requirement
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    justinhess

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int actualEffort
      the actual effort of completing the requirement
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> assignedTo
      team members the requirement is assigned to need to figure out the class of a user name, then use that instead of TeamMember

      attachments associated with the requirement
      private java.lang.String description
      a short description of the requirement

      the estimated amount of effort to complete the requirement

      flag to indicate when the requirement estimate was just edited

      history of transactions of the requirement

      the ID of the requirement

      iteration the requirement is assigned to

      notes associated with the requirement

      the ID of the requirement that this requirement is a sub-requirement of

      the project status of the requirement

      private java.util.ArrayList<AcceptanceTest> tests
      acceptance tests associated with the requirement
      private RequirementType type
      the type of the requirement
      private boolean wasCreated
      flag to indicate whether the requirement was just created or not

      • Requirement

        public Requirement(int id,
           java.lang.String name,
           java.lang.String description)
        Construct a Requirement with required properties provided and others set to default
        Parameters:
        id - The ID number of the requirement
        name - The name of the requirement
        description - A short description of the requirement

      • Requirement

        @Deprecated
public Requirement(int id,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String release,
                      RequirementStatus status,
                      RequirementPriority priority,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      int estimate,
                      int effort)
        Deprecated. Should not be used anymore.
        Constructs a requirement from the provided characteristics
        Parameters:
        id - The ID number of the requirement
        name - The name of the requirement
        release - The release number of the requirement
        status - The status of the requirement
        priority - The priorty of the requirement
        description - A short description of the requirement
        estimate - The estimated time required by the task. This is in a point system decided by the user
        effort - The estimated amount of work required by the requirement.
